name: Leopard Box
description: The Leopard Box in Small showcases the signature whimsical details of KIFU PARIS. This piece includes intricate inlay work of shagreen, pen shell & bronze patina brass to create this stunning pattern. Available in other sizes and different finishes. New York - 1 unit in stock. Handmade. Shagreen & Pen Shell & Bronze-Patina Brass. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
